Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.SlaversStates

package it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State.SlaversStates
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    it.polimi.ingsw.gc11.controller.State
     
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    LooseState
    Represents the state where a Player has lost a combat against the Slavers during the AdventurePhase of the game.
    SlaversState
    Represents the combat state when a Player is facing the Slavers adventure card during the AdventurePhase.
    WinState
    Represents the state reached when a player successfully wins against the Slavers card during the adventure phase of the game.
